etymology.description: 旭 (dawn; rising sun) + 婷 (elegant; graceful) = a name implying graceful dawn
etymology.interpretation: 旭婷 is often used as a given name for females, conveying the idea of someone who is as elegant or graceful as the dawn. It combines the imagery of a new beginning with aesthetic grace.

examples.chinese: 旭婷是一个美丽的名字。
examples.pinyin: Xùtíng shì yī gè měilì de míngzì.

examples.chinese: 在班级中，旭婷总是很受欢迎(在班級中，旭婷總是很受歡迎)。
examples.pinyin: Zài bānjí zhōng, Xùtíng zǒng shì hěn shòu huānyíng.
examples.english: In class, Xuting is always very popular.
